[#state-of-erosion_result-value]
====== Result value

[frame=none, cols="1,5"]
|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:soil-plot-soil-description-protocol-shapes:state-of-erosion:result-value`
|Label | Result value
|Definition | The value of `rdf:value` _MUST_ exist in the Soils erosion states codes controlled vocabulary.
|Comment | The value in `sosa:hasResult` _MUST_ be a value in `sh:in`, which is the Soils erosion states codes controlled vocabulary.
include::../../../../statuses/submitted.adoc[]
|Conformance Classes | `TBA`

|Property | Value
|Controlled list items | The result value MUST be from the following list: 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/4b24ea88-1a04-5cd5-ab31-fc61cd4b5a45[`Absent`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/a5d1700c-b3fe-5832-83d3-8f839e42a4fa[`Active`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/b7a839e2-0512-59bd-bfeb-024648dadcb9[`Not Applicable`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/2077173e-7d90-5513-8fc4-a4a98464ff35[`Not Collected`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/b05b3bab-761c-5a13-a096-afffdd9cbd8a[`Partially stabilised`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/a873feaf-57d6-52e0-9834-6ff22331dd0f[`Stabilised`]
